channel.title: [317-317-317]Bad-Scape v1.5![317-317-317]
channel.description:
BADSCAPE V1.5!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! hello this is _owner mike_ / _marcello_ owner and coder of bad-scape and qoodscape. this is the best release so far v1 wasnt completly amazing but this one wowed me. after 1week of work i put together things that were never seen before in a server things ive added!!! DOWNLOAD LINK AT BOTTOM!!! [b]DO NOT LEECH IF YOU USE THIS SOURCE PLEASE COMMENT AND TELL ME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!![/b] [b]DO NOT LEECH IF YOU USE THIS SOURCE PLEASE COMMENT AND TELL ME!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!![/b]
::::::::::::things ive added:::::::::::: :::::: new commands ::::::::::: ::commands ::jad ::pkbox ::bh (first bountyhunter on a 317?) ::dtown (donator town) ::dpk (not fully finished but its donator pk) ::::::::::::::::::::::::and way more:::::::::::::::: ::modcommands ::hobo (hobo outfit) ::modring :::::::::::::::::and more::::::::::: ::admincommands ::ipban ::banuser ::pnpc ::npc :::::::::::::::and more::::::::::::::
:::::::::::new places i edited:::::::::::::: Bounty Hunter! never seen before New pkbox! never seen before New train New Skills (as promised) custom veng!!! and more!
::::::::::::::::::::::::PICTURES!!!:::::::::::::::::::::::::::: home [img]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt300/qoodscape/evolved0015.png[/img] train [img]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt300/qoodscape/evolved0016.png[/img] shops [img]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt300/qoodscape/evolved0017.png[/img] pkbox [img]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt300/qoodscape/evolved0018.png[/img] veng [IMG]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt300/qoodscape/evolved0019.png[/img] JAD [IMG]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt300/qoodscape/evolved0020.png[/img] BOUNTY HUNTER [IMG]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt300/qoodscape/evolved0021.png[/img] NEW SKILLS AS PROMISED [IMG]http://i621.photobucket.com/albums/tt300/qoodscape/evolved0022.png[/img]
_owner mike_ aka QoodScape credits allstar owner mike / marcello / qoodscape (all same person) (me)
